## ContractPrimarySale.getRecipient() method

Get the primary sale recipient.

## Example

```javascript
const salesRecipient = await contract.sales.getRecipient();
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
getRecipient(): Promise<string>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string&gt;

the wallet address.
